title: Somebody waiting
creator_credit: Dick Snider, Hal Riney and University of California, Los Angeles
brief_description: An evocative and poignant view of the staff of Corcoran Cottage as they attempt, with some success, to make life more stimulating and comfortable for the severely mentally and physically handicapped children of Corcoran Cottage, California.
